answers.answer: That depends on several factors, how high your blood pressure is going, if it is stable or fluctuating, also on you adema and swelling. I was not scheduled for my induction until 1 week prior to me due date. I was diagnosed with pre eclampsia at 8 months with my first son. I did however have a seizure and end up staying in icu for a week.... Early may not be a bad thing for you and baby.
My friend just had her baby today due to preeclampsia. At 34 weeks 5 days.

Yes they will. Or just give you the option if a c seaction. 3rd pragnancy,  1st was 34 weeks for high bp, 2nd I was on bed rest 6 weeks for high bp, water broke. Still waiting in this little guy, but I had a scare last week with bp, and they went ahead and gave me steroid ***** to mature his lungs!
